dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2196 IH: To provide for an extension of the legislative authority of the National Emergency Medical Services Memorial Foundation to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Hudson (for himself and Mr. Lynch) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To provide for an extension of the legislative authority of the National Emergency Medical Services Memorial Foundation to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs.

section.header: Extension of legislative authority for memorial establishment
section.text: Section 1(b) of Public Law 115â€“275 is amended by striking the period at the end and inserting , except that any reference in section 8903(e) of that chapter to the expiration at the end of or extension beyond a seven-year period shall be considered to be a reference to an expiration on or extension beyond November 3, 2032..
